2072.subject: HPWE
2072.descrlong: Covers surfing for beginners and first timers.  Opportunities for advanced surfers to act as aids to the head instructor. Covers etiquette, right of way rules, equipment, and safety.  Must be able to pass a swimming safety test.  Includes extensive in-the-water experience.  Requires some equipment.  Surf boards will be supplied. Course fee required. Credit/ No Credit. (Offered every semester.)
